func:
var Watts =  Math.round(global.get("Amps") * global.get("Volts") * 1) /1
global.set("Watts",Watts)
global.set("WattsAcumm",global.get("WattsAcumm") + Watts )
global.set("WattsAcummCnt",global.get("WattsAcummCnt") + 1 )
msg.payload = Watts
return msg;

msg.Watts = global.get("WattsAcumm")
msg.Cnt = global.get("WattsAcummCnt")
msg.payload = msg.Watts / 1000 * msg.Cnt / 3600
global.set("WattsAcumm",0)
global.set("WattsAcummCnt",0)
return msg;
